biotools.summary: BEar Alignment Global and Local. Perform pairwise alignments of RNA secondary structure. The method exploits a new encoding for RNA secondary structure (BEAR) and a substitution matrix for RNA structural elements (MBR) .

bioschemas.name: Web-Beagle
